title: report the cheating program

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: 3 of us dc when mini comes out we check our pc and internet all good we all so try orther game account it works. just can not reconnect this one after 14 mins when we reconnect we lost the rank game, i saw the some cheating program before so we know it must be the cheating program we did report in the game just give remind here and system says we r afk so we need wait orther 5 games i think thats not fair to us so can u do anything with that?

replies.body: It seems like you might have been affected by an [issue that is currently affecting Oceania that is currently causing issues with connecting to games properly. ](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/RF70PdWb-game-start-game-disconnect-issues-17032016)  We're currently working on resolving it, and will keep that thread updated ASAP.
I hope this issue doesn't happen again I just lost a ranked match because of it.
will we be refunded ip for the lost games when we have disconnected?
